long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Text Reader and Translator extension empowers users to easily interact with text on any webpage. It allows users to select text, have it read aloud in their preferred language, and translate it into another language instantly. By combining text-to-speech and translation features, the extension makes web content more accessible and user-friendly.

Key Benefits:
1. Read Aloud: Converts selected text into speech, supporting multiple languages and making it convenient for users to consume content hands-free.
2. Instant Translation: Translates selected text into the language of your choice, breaking down language barriers for seamless comprehension.
3. User-Friendly: Simple to use with intuitive controls for selecting, translating, and listening to text.

Whether you're browsing foreign websites, learning a new language, or just want to listen instead of read, this extension is a must-have tool for enhanced online experiences. Install it now and make your browsing smarter and more accessible!
